desc:
Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.
Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes:
Mana Burn is blocked by spell immunity.
You can lifeleech the damage dealt by this skill with a Lifesteal aura.
lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
name: antimage_mana_break

desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
cmb:
60/60/60/60
12/9/7/5
lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
name: antimage_blink

desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
name: antimage_spell_shield

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
notes:
The stun passes through spell immunity.
Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
cmb:
125/200/275
70
lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
name: antimage_mana_void
